Game.Name: Bibi und Tina - Ferien auf dem Martinshof (Germany)
Game.plot: Bibi und Tina: Ferien auf dem Martinshof is an Adventure game, developed by Morgen Studios and published by Kiddinx,which was released in Europe in 2006.
Game.Notes: Bibi und Tina: Ferien auf dem Martinshof is an Adventure game, developed by Morgen Studios and published by Kiddinx, which was released in Europe in 2006.
